comments:
The debug hover fills the .log

Sun 1.4.1_02 for both, runtime and target workspace

The error code (23) indicates an invalid method (JDWP spec), which is not one 
of the spec'd error codes when retrieving the "this object" for a stack frame. 
The closest error is an invalid frame (error 30).

Marking as later, unless we can find steps to reproduce.
